feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and colons for punctuation.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical choices and word structures.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are comparable in complexity and length.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share a similar tone and mood.

feature5.explanation: There are no noticeable spelling or typographical errors in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
